snippet: MISS HAYES AT BROOKLYN.--To-night Miss HAYES gives a concert at Montgomery Hall, Brooklyn. This will enable our Brooklyn friends to hear her without the inconvenience of crossing the ferry....
lead_paragraph: MISS HAYES AT BROOKLYN.--To-night Miss HAYES gives a concert at Montgomery Hall, Brooklyn. This will enable our Brooklyn friends to hear her without the inconvenience of crossing the ferry.

headline.main: BROOKLYN.; MISS HAYES AT BROOKLYN. THE LONG ISLAND RAILROAD. FIGURES NEVER LIE. SCHUYLER GUARDS. FIRE.
